headline: Divorce Rate: How Well Do You Know International Divorce Rates?
short descr: We've all heard that nearly half of all marriages in the U.S. end in divorce (whether the stat is accurate is another story
image_caption(s): QUESTION: In 2010, which country's divorce rate rose for the first time in almost a decade?
article: We've all heard that nearly half of all marriages in the U.S. end in divorce (whether the stat is accurate is another story). But how well do you know divorce rates from around the world? Click through the slideshow below to see how your knowledge of worldwide splits stacks up.

headline: The Wilds Of Patagonia: Taking On The Glaciers Of El Calafate (PHOTOS)
authors:
Jacada Travel, Contributor
Inspired, Tailor-Made Travel to Latin America, Africa, Asia, A...
short descr: As summer approaches, many might not be thinking about ice-scapes or glaciers -- unless maybe to cool off at the thought of them.
image_caption(s): Sunset across Lake Argentino and the Patagonia Steppe from Eolo Lodge
article: As summer approaches, many might not be thinking about ice-scapes or glaciers -- unless maybe to cool off at the thought of them. We imagine the beach is a more likely dream destination for many in the coming months.Nevertheless, with a summer of sports and the Olympics round the corner, the Jacada team has been thinking about the more active, exhilarating and adrenaline-spiking tours and destinations we offer for our bespoke, luxury and interest-led trips.And it just so happens that our senior travel designer George visited Argentina's Glacier Region of El Calafate in April and brought back some thrilling photographs. So cool off on the slideshow below, then give us a call to see how we can satisfy your tastes for adventure.http://www.jacadatravel.com/Place/27/calafate&tab=Map Telephone: +44 (0) 207 562 8288 (UK) or +1 866 610 1533 (US)
